thread.title: Former jihadists interviewed by the press agree: Trump’s travel ban will boost ISIS recruitment
thread.title_full: Former jihadists interviewed by the press agree: Trump’s travel ban will boost ISIS recruitment

author: Brett T.
title: Former jihadists interviewed by the press agree: Trump’s travel ban will boost ISIS recruitment
text:
— Sandy (@RightGlockMom) January 30, 2017 
Wow, these former ISIS members sure are feeling talkative. “They elected the dog Trump! I swear to God, he will burn the world.” — Former ISIS fighter https://t.co/BKAlsMJ5eX 
— BuzzFeed News (@BuzzFeedNews) January 30, 2017 
Five out of five current and former ISIS members interviewed by Western media agree: Trump’s rhetoric is good for recruitment. @BuzzFeedNews shhh! Guy who supported torturing, burning, shooting, beheading innocents is giving his opinion! 
— Juggy Gales (@JuggyGales24) January 30, 2017 That feeling when journalists interview and side with ISIS supporters to somehow show the right is crazy. @BuzzFeedNews 
— Dick Ng Bimbos (@BillySullivan7) January 30, 2017 @BuzzFeedNews First a bogus dossier, now quoting an "anonymous" ISIS fighter. You need to review your sourcing. 
— Stop MSMBias (@ChooseYour_News) January 30, 2017 So I guess ISIS didn't want to attack Americans before @Potus was elected? Now they're really triggered and gunning for us? @BuzzFeedNews 
— Liberty For Mankind (@liberty4mankind) January 30, 2017 @BuzzFeedNews so if Hillary won, they would've just been chill for the next 4 years? #naive 
— Chieftan (@LaissezBair) January 30, 2017 
National Review’s David French, who has been receiving a lot of well-deserved attention for his facts-over-hysteria analysis of the travel ban, laid out a challenge for BuzzFeed. Hey guys, can y'all pinpoint the Obama rhetoric that caused ISIS to get so dangerous? Or maybe it doesn't matter what America does. https://t.co/sFUcsF4UcE 
— David French (@DavidAFrench) January 30, 2017 
Dangerous? But just last year John Kerry said ISIS was “on the run.” 
— Trump'sDietCoke ℅57™ (@EF517_V2) January 30, 2017 @DavidAFrench we should totally listen to ISIS and @BuzzFeed Propaganda. NOT.
